build.command: FLUTTER_VERSION=3.29.0 && set -x && if ! command -v flutter >/dev/null 2>&1; then curl -L https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_${FLUTTER_VERSION}-stable.tar.xz | tar -xJ && "$(pwd)/flutter/bin/flutter" config --disable-analytics --no-cli-animations && make buildWeb flutter="$(pwd)/flutter/bin/flutter"; else make buildWeb; fi
